Class Project

java.lang.Object
com.builderportfolio.model.Project
public class Project extends Object
Represents a project with its details, including associated client, assigned builder, project manager, and project status.

Each project has a unique project ID that is auto-incremented for every new instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String projectName, String projectDescription, LocalDate projectStartDate, LocalDate projectEndDate, ProjectStatus projectStatus, Client assignedClient, String assignedBuilder, String assignedProjectManager)
      Constructs a new Project with the specified details.

      The project ID is automatically assigned by incrementing the last generated ID.

      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project
      projectDescription - the description of the project
      projectStartDate - the start date of the project
      projectEndDate - the end date of the project
      projectStatus - the current status of the project
      assignedClient - the client associated with the project
      assignedBuilder - the builder assigned to the project
      assignedProjectManager - the project manager assigned to the project
